definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: If you could live any place in the world, where would it be?
sentences.chinese: 如果我能任選居處，我希望住在那裏？

sentences.english: I went over to Rosies place to see Cody and Rosie.
sentences.chinese: 我朝羅西的居處方向走，去見一下科迪和羅西。

sentences.english: It will help you to remember all of those niggling things you can't possibly keep in your head.
sentences.chinese: 本書將協助您記居處有哪些不成能留在腦海裏的瑣事。

definition: to restore old way/to return to the past
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
faithful (to the memory of betrothed)/constant (of widow who remains unmarried)
postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
